column2: Disney film units settle Silicon Valley anti-poaching lawsuit SAN FRANCISCO
column3: July 12 Walt Disney Co's  Lucasfilm Ltd and Pixar units have settled a lawsuit accusing them and other technology companies of conspiring not to poach each others' employees
column4: resolving their part in a case that involves some of Silicon Valley's biggest names.
